channel.title: How to add an PHP/MySQL Auth System to a Powerbot Script (rsbot)
channel.description:
Im using this payed auth system... >>[url=http://codecanyon.net/item/php-key-generation-and-authentication-class/full_screen_preview/108433]http://codecanyon.net/item/php-key-generation-and-authentication-class/full_screen_preview/108433[/url]<<
And i was wondering if someone could tell me how to impliment this into a .java file (rsbot script)
I know how to make the mysql tables and all that i was just wondering how to add it into java...
ALSO, how can i make it give the user a AUTH (i know how to make it make them) automatically after paying?

item.title: How to add an PHP/MySQL Auth System to a Powerbot Script (rsbot)
item.dc:creator: @Ninja_Panda Ninja Panda
item.description:
@Ninja_Panda wrote:

That doesn’t really help me but thanks anyways…

Read full topic
